effect: [AUTO](RC)[Generation Break 1](This ability is active if you have one or more face up G units in total on your (VC) or G zone):When your opponent's rear-guard is put into his or her deck due to an effect from one of your cards, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

[AUTO]:[Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1] When this unit is placed on (VC), you may pay the cost. IF you do, choose up to one card from your hand, call it to (RC), until end of turn, that unit gets "[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, if it is the first battle of that turn, [Stand] this unit.".

effect:

(The state of the card does not change)
